about_the_game:
World of Guns VR: Starter Pack unlocks 15 models from different categories

Categories and models which are included in Starter Pack
Assault Rifles: FN FAL, M16A1
Pistols: Desert Eagle, CZ-75, SIG P228
Shotgun: Remington 870
Revolver: S&W Model 53
Machinegun: Browning M1919A4
Rifle: SIG SG550S
SMG: Ingram Mac-10
WWII: DP-27 machingun, Boys Anti-Tank rifle
Sport: Ruger MKII
Historical:Lewis Machingun
Compact: COP pistol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Graphics: Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.

short_description: World of Guns:Starter Pack unlocks 15 models from different categories
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
